conditions.description_zh: 检测当前行为是否已启用。
conditions.description_en: Test if the behavior is enabled.

actions.description_en: Set the rate the object spins at.

actions.description_zh: 设置每秒旋转角度变化的速率，正数则顺时针加速，负数逆时针加速。
actions.description_en: Set the rate the object's spinning changes.
Set whether this behavior is enabled.

expressions.description_zh: 当前旋转速度，以度数/每秒为单位。
expressions.description_en: The current rotation speed in degrees per second.

expressions.description_zh: 当前的旋转加速度，以度数/秒为单位。
expressions.description_en: The current rotation acceleration in degrees per second per second.

properties.description_zh: 转速，以度/秒为单位。 正向为顺时针，负向为逆时针
properties.description_en: The rotation speed, in degrees per second.  Positive is clockwise and negative is anticlockwise.

properties.description_zh: 每秒旋转的加速度，以角度/秒为单位。负数则减速。
properties.description_en: Rotation acceleration in degrees per second per second (negative slows down).

properties.description_zh: 游戏初始化时，是否默认启用该行为。
properties.description_en: Whether the behavior is initially enabled or disabled.

properties.description_zh: 在编辑器中进行实时预览。
properties.description_en: Tick to run a live preview in the editor.
